item.title: Najila add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "I love you without knowing how, or when, or from where. I love you simply, without problems or pride: I love you in this way because I do not know any other way of loving but this, in which there is no I or you, so intimate that your hand upon my chest is my hand, so intimate that when I fall asleep your eyes close." -- Pablo Neruda

item.title: Najila add a quote by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
item.description:
"One day,' you said, 'I watched the sunset forty-three times!'
And a little later you added: 'You know, when one is that sad, one can get to love the sunset.'
'Were you that sad, then, on the day of the forty-three sunset?'
But the prince made no answer." -- Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
